'''Sun Crab''' is a type of crab that can be found in the wild.

==Drops==
{{Card|Crab|1}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Sun Crabs can be found in [[Mondstadt]], [[Liyue]], [[Sumeru]], and [[Fontaine]].

There are over 20 of them at the southernmost point of [[Chenyu Vale]], and several others can be found along the [[Falcon Coast]].
<gallery>
Wildlife Location Sun Crab.png|Locations
</gallery>

See the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=307 Official Interactive Map] for specific locations.
